message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate you taking the time to show me this product. I'm interested, but  $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. How about $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $85 is a bit of a stretch for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $87.50?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still a bit hesitant at $87.50.  How about we split the difference and go with $86?
I understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $88?
